#summary System information provider module.
#labels Phase-Design

= Introduction =

This module should gather system information under Microsoft Windows Operating Systems.

= Details =

It devides on several information areas:

= Example: =

*ModuleInformation*

_Module Version: 1_

*SystemInformation*

_OS: Windows 6.1.7600_

_Memory: 4193460K total, 2797200K free_

_Power status: AC_

_DirectX version string: 10.0_

_DirectX version hex number: a0000_

_Processor String: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 CPU          6300  @ 1.86GHz_

_Processor Vendor String: GenuineIntel_

_Processor Support Intel SSE: Yes_

_Processor Support Intel SSE2: Yes_

_Processor Support Intel SSE3: Yes_

_Processor Support Intel SSSE3: Yes_

_Processor Support Intel SSE4_1: No_

_Processor Support Intel SSE4_2: No_

_Number of available processors: 2_

_GPU vendor string: ATI Technologies Inc. / Advanced Micro Devices, Inc._

_GPU vendor hex number: 1002_

_GPU device string: ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series_

_GPU device hex number: 9442_

_GPU max vertex shader hardware support: 3_

_GPU max pixel shader hardware support: 3_

= Compiler Support =

_Microsoft Visual Studio 2005,2008_

_Intell C++ Compiler 11_
